definition: square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
major policy of the national government
see 雙百方針|双百方针[shuang1 bai3 fang1 zhen1]

the eight-character slogan for the economic policy proposed by 李富春[Li3 Fu4 chun1] in 1961: 調整、鞏固、充實、提高|调整、巩固、充实、提高 "adjust, consolidate, enrich and improve"/a policy expressed as an eight-character slogan
refers to 百花運動|百花运动[Bai3 hua1 Yun4 dong4] with its slogan 百花齊放，百家爭鳴|百花齐放，百家争鸣

sentences.english: Lack of stable business guidelines and governance for data quality.
sentences.chinese: 缺乏数据质量的可靠业务指导方针和治理。

sentences.english: We could probably get started with a strategy meeting.
sentences.chinese: 我们也许可以先开一个战略方针会。

sentences.english: This is a matter of strategic policy, and I hope the Military Commission will discuss it.
sentences.chinese: 这是战略方针的问题，希望军委讨论一下。

sentences.english: In all our work we must persevere in the Anti-Japanese National United Front as the general policy.
sentences.chinese: 在一切工作中，应该坚持抗日民族统一战线的总方针。

sentences.english: China's energy development is based on the principle of relying on domestic resources.
sentences.chinese: 中国能源发展坚持立足国内的基本方针。

sentences.english: Comprehensively implement the party’s education policy, teaching, education simultaneously Friday.
sentences.chinese: 全面贯彻执行党的教育方针，教书育人，五育并举。

sentences.english: Our action is not to admission exclusivity.
sentences.chinese: 咱们的方针是不授与专卖权。

sentences.english: This is a consistent guideline of Albania and will never change.
sentences.chinese: 这是阿的既定方针，不会改变。

sentences.english: This is a bad design practice that runs counter to our internal design guidelines.
sentences.chinese: 这是违背我们内部设计指导方针的不好的设计实践。

sentences.english: For an educational environment, that was exactly the right policy.
sentences.chinese: 在教育领域，那恰是一种正确的方针。

sentences.english: In a rights-based approach, every human being is recognized both as a person and as a right-holder.
sentences.chinese: 以权利为本的方针将每个人都视为权利拥有者。

sentences.english: They stress the need to placate protesters rather than respond with force.
sentences.chinese: 这一方针更强调安抚抗议者，而非以暴制暴。

sentences.english: Our policy is not to grant exclusivity.
sentences.chinese: 我们的方针是不授于专卖权。

sentences.english: Describes guidelines for implementing functionality in classes and structures.
sentences.chinese: 描述在类别和结构中实作功能的方针。

sentences.english: Of course, many bureaucracies suffer from communications problems, blurred lines of authority and plain old dumb decisions.
sentences.chinese: 当然，许多官僚机构有沟通问题，搞不清当局的方针。

sentences.english: We increased spending on efforts to help the rural poor through development.
sentences.chinese: 坚持开发式扶贫方针，加大扶贫投入力度。

definition: major policy of the national government
to implement/to put into practice/to carry out

the eight-character slogan for the economic policy proposed by 李富春[Li3 Fu4 chun1] in 1961: 調整、鞏固、充實、提高|调整、巩固、充实、提高 "adjust, consolidate, enrich and improve"/a policy expressed as an eight-character slogan
